messages.content: implement a page to showcase the 2 most useful variants of button component from FDS

current query: Structure the code implementation from the previous step into a well-organized format with proper file names, code snippets, and descriptions for the button showcase page implementation.

plan.instruction: Research and identify the 2 most useful button component variants from FDS (Fabric Design System). First get startup instructions, then list all available components to find button components, then get the variants for button components, and finally get detailed documentation for the most useful variants.
sub_steps: List all available FDS components to identify button components
Get documentation for the most useful button variants

plan.instruction: Based on the button component variants identified in the previous step, implement a complete showcase page that demonstrates the 2 most useful button variants from FDS. Include proper HTML structure, Vue.js implementation, styling, and interactive examples.
sub_steps: Create HTML structure for the showcase page
Implement Vue.js components for the button variants

plan.instruction: Structure the code implementation from the previous step into a well-organized format with proper file names, code snippets, and descriptions for the button showcase page implementation.
sub_steps: Structure the HTML, Vue.js, and CSS code into separate files
Add proper file names and descriptions
Ensure code is executable and well-formatted
